Text: This is hardcore, buddy. What you consider hardcore is probably metal in disguise. Hardcore, back in the 80's, was Dead Kennedys, Bad Religion, Black Flag, Minor Threat, The Germs, and these guys. The definition changed over time, but this is what the old schoolers still think of when we say "hardcore".
I think Discharge, Varukers, Crucifix, Anti Cimex, Mob 47, Antisect, that kind of stuff

wait how are the adolescents and black flag not considered hardcore? that's what hardcore is.
it's short for hardcore PUNK. derr. everyone knows that
